forum.content:
I'd like to find someone to chat in English face to face, maybe we can have a coffee, beer, which is in public place.

I suggest that we can fine a topic first, then meet somewhere in kaohsiung. Of course, you also can talk anything you like.

I just want to get the feeling back, I'm afraid that my English speaking is disappeared.

if you are interesting in, please feel free to add me.
forum.title: face to face
